item.title: How I Read Papers for Blogposts
item.author: mycaptainmy@gmail.com (Yuan Meng)
item.description:
Former OpenAI’s Lilian Weng has taught foundational/SOTA ideas in AI/ML to a generation of ML practitioners with her awesome blogposts. It all began with her personal nodes and desire to understand through teaching.

I started my blogpost with the same motivation: By putting my learnings for others to see, it movitates myself to think more clearly and explicitly.

So, how do I get started? For ranking topics that I wish to dive deeper into, I sually read papers in 3 batches. Take An Evolution of Learning to Rank for example:
